Package com.github.actionfx.core.converter

Interface Converter<S,​T>

  • Type Parameters:
    S - the source type
    T - the target type
    All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.function.Function<S,​T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDateConverter, AbstractFloatingPointConverter, AbstractJavaTimeConverter, DateToJavaTimeConverter, DateToStringConverter, DoubleToStringConverter, FileToPathConverter, FileToStringConverter, FileToURIConverter, FloatToStringConverter, JavaTimeToDateConverter, JavaTimeToJavaTimeConverter, JavaTimeToStringConverter, NumberToNumberConverter, ObjectToStringConverter, PathToFileConverter, PathToStringConverter, PathToURIConverter, StringToDateConverter, StringToDoubleConverter, StringToFileConverter, StringToFloatConverter, StringToJavaTimeConverter, StringToNumberConverter, StringToPathConverter, StringToURIConverter, URIToFileConverter, URIToPathConverter, URIToStringConverter
    public interface Converter<S,​T>
extends java.util.function.Function<S,​T>
    A converter converts a source object of type S to a target of type T.
    Author:
    koster

    • Method Detail

      • convert

        T convert​(S source)
        Convert the source object of type S to target type T.
        Parameters:
        source - the source object to convert, which must be an instance of S (never null)
        Returns:
        the converted object, which must be an instance of T (potentially null)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the source cannot be converted to the desired target type

        default T apply​(S source)
